attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I personally think that all working memebers of the public should be eligible for a duvet day once a year.  A duvet day being a non sick day, but just a day to curl up under your duvet with no worries about work. A relaxing carefree day.  Brits work the longest hours on the continant, the Spanish has siestas, and we get tax. Duvet Days are the way forward!
